#include <iostream>
//#include <iomanip>
#include <stdio.h>
//using namespace std;
int main(){
       int x;
       float y;
       
       scanf("%d%f",&x,&y); //cin >> x >> y;
       
       if(x%5 != 0 || x+0.5 > y)
         printf("%.2f\n",y); //cout << fixed << setprecision(2) << y << endl;
       else
         printf("%.2f\n",y-(x+0.5)); //cout << fixed << setprecision(2) << y-(x+0.5) << endl;
         
       return 0;
       }
